TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 96

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to---------, August —, 1828. Geographical description of Texas, present population, agricultural statistics, social conditions.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: This article was subsequently attached by Austin to a section of his map of Texas. There is a copy also in a clipping, without date, from the Galveston News.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 96

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to---------, August —, 1828. Geographical description of Texas, present population, agricultural statistics, social conditions.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-xx-1828">August, 1828.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
